name: koinos-miner
description: Mining application used to mint the KOIN ERC-20.

scripts.postinstall: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/local/bin/gcc-10 -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=.. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && cmake --build . --target install --config Release && cd .. && rm -rf build

author: OpenOrchard, Inc.
